channel.title: [FIXED] Stuck in the closet...
channel.description:
I'm sorry I didn't get position stats,
After resonance cascade I went into the locker room the security guard following me said "Grab what you need and lets go" I went to Freeman's locker thinking there must be something other than the battery park (I grabbed earlier). I was trying to grab the picture of the baby thinking this must be something worth grabbing. I ended up grabbing the box on the shelf and threw it out into the main area. I turned around to grab the picture (I may have jumped), but I could not grab it. I turned to walk out and I got stuck. Jumping and shifting side to side, I am firmly rooted in place, I was unable to leave the locker . I don't think the security guard was in my way I was just stuck. I couldn't move side to side and using the jump I didn't move up or down. Crouching also didn't help.
I just thought it might be something that might be an issue
Edit: I went back to this area... I found after throwing the box out I can still move in and out however if I jump inside the closet I am unable to exit the locker and I am unable to crouch all I can do is look around
setpos 1575.088135 4127.500000 477.481781;setang 4.877058 -113.980003 -0.713881
![bm_c1a1b0015.jpg|690x500](upload://skTNYsJ70SwlCx8KKtNaO95aRvJ.jpeg)

item.title: [FIXED] Stuck in the closet...
item.dc:creator: Crozix
item.description:
The same bug also applies for bm_c1a0a.
It seems like the player is sucked into the suit when jumping.

The problem after creating a mockup locker is that the collision on the suit is causing the problem. (I had to make an mockup since hammer crashed on the real map)

So for devs reading this change the collision to “Not Solid” on the prop locker_suit, on the map bm_c1a0a and bm_c1a1b. (or any other places where that model is used)

Read full topic

item.title: [FIXED] Stuck in the closet...
item.dc:creator: Eye_con
item.description:
I’m sorry I didn’t get position stats,

After resonance cascade I went into the locker room the security guard following me said “Grab what you need and lets go” I went to Freeman’s locker thinking there must be something other than the battery park (I grabbed earlier). I was trying to grab the picture of the baby thinking this must be something worth grabbing. I ended up grabbing the box on the shelf and threw it out into the main area. I turned around to grab the picture (I may have jumped), but I could not grab it. I turned to walk out and I got stuck. Jumping and shifting side to side, I am firmly rooted in place, I was unable to leave the locker . I don’t think the security guard was in my way I was just stuck. I couldn’t move side to side and using the jump I didn’t move up or down. Crouching also didn’t help.

I just thought it might be something that might be an issue

Edit: I went back to this area… I found after throwing the box out I can still move in and out however if I jump inside the closet I am unable to exit the locker and I am unable to crouch all I can do is look around
